sentence.Network_en: Elasmosaurus was not a dinosaur. It was a plesiosaur.
sentence.Network_cn: 依拉丝莫龙不是恐龙, 它是蛇颈龙.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蛇颈龙（plesiosaur）（Plesiosaur）是海中爬虫类的一种，海中爬虫类包括了海洋鳄鱼和鱼龙。它们由陆上生物演化而来，再回到海洋中生活。
长颈龙（plesiosaur）是一种长颈肉食水中爬虫类，曾在二亿年前侏罗纪时期至六千五百万年前主宰海洋世界，但判断该化石的年代约 …

list.abs: ...化石记载说明由干系爬行类发展成为鱼龙类,ichthyosaur,蛇颈龙类,plesiosaurs,和初龙类的进出路线,其中有的种类回到海洋,后来的辐射发展成为似哺乳类爬行类,龟类,翼龙类,鸟类,恐.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin Plesiosaurus, from Greek plēsios 'near' + sauros 'lizard'

means.word_mean: 1. extinct marine reptile with a small head on a long neck a short tail and four paddle-shaped limbs; of the Jurassic and Cretaceous

auth_sentence.content: Pliosaurs are aquatic reptiles belonging to the plesiosaur family.

auth_sentence.content: She found a giant sea reptile, or Plesiosaur.

auth_sentence.content: On the fifth night of our search, I see a plesiosaur.
